typeSystemDescription.name: julie-document-meta-types
typeSystemDescription.description: The type system contains types for the annotation of document meta information (bibliographical and content information).

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jules.types.DocumentAnnotation
typeDescription.description: The super-type for the document annotation types (Header, Descriptor)

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jules.types.Header
typeDescription.description: The Header type stores the bibliographical document information.

featureDescription.name: docType
featureDescription.description: The type of the document (e.g. abstract, fulltext, randomized), C

featureDescription.name: source
featureDescription.description: The source of the document (e.g. WWW, Database), C

featureDescription.name: docId
featureDescription.description: The identifier of the document with respect to its source. E.g.: PMID in PubMed. In combination with the source, this is a unique identifier for a document, C

featureDescription.name: copyright
featureDescription.description: Copyright information, C

featureDescription.name: truncated
featureDescription.description: Indicates whether the document is truncated, C

featureDescription.name: authors
featureDescription.description: The authors of the document, O

featureDescription.name: title
featureDescription.description: The title of the document, C

featureDescription.name: pubTypeList
featureDescription.description: The list of the publication types, O

featureDescription.name: language
featureDescription.description: The language of the document, O

featureDescription.name: doi
featureDescription.description: document object identifier

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jules.types.pubmed.Header
typeDescription.description: The special Header for PubMed (http://www.pubmed.org) documents

featureDescription.name: citationStatus
featureDescription.description: Indicates the status of citation of a PubMed document, O

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jules.types.PubType
typeDescription.description: An abstract type which should be used to store information on the publication. See subtypes Journal and an accumulative type (OtherPub)

featureDescription.name: name
featureDescription.description: The name of the publication type (e.g. journal, technical report, book), C

featureDescription.name: pubDate
featureDescription.description: The date on which the document was published, O

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jules.types.Journal
typeDescription.description: This type contains attributes to describe a journal publication.

featureDescription.name: ISSN
featureDescription.description: The international standard serial number, O

featureDescription.name: volume
featureDescription.description: The volume number of the journal in which the article was published, O

featureDescription.name: title
featureDescription.description: Full journal title, C

featureDescription.name: impactFactor
featureDescription.description: The impact factor of the journal at the time of publication, O

featureDescription.name: shortTitle
featureDescription.description: the short title of the Journal (e.g. "Nicotine Tob Res" for "Nicotine & tobacco research : official journal of the Society for Research on Nicotine and Tobacco")

featureDescription.name: issue
featureDescription.description: Issue of Journal

featureDescription.name: pages
featureDescription.description: Pages of Journal

featureDescription.name: day
featureDescription.description: day of the month, C

featureDescription.name: month
featureDescription.description: month of the year, C

featureDescription.name: year
featureDescription.description: full year (e.g. 2006 and NOT 06), C

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jules.types.OtherPub
typeDescription.description: Accumulative type for all other types of publications

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jules.types.Descriptor
typeDescription.description: An abstract type for the document descriptors, there are two subclasses: one for automatically acquired meta information and one for meta information that was added manually (such as e.g. MeSH term lists)

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jules.types.AutoDescriptor
typeDescription.description: The descriptor type for automatically (i.e. algorithmically) acquired meta information. It can be refined and extended.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jules.types.ManualDescriptor
typeDescription.description: The descriptor type for the manually added information.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jules.types.MeshHeading
typeDescription.description: Medical Subject Headings, see NLM's MeSH for a detailed description.

featureDescription.name: descriptorName
featureDescription.description: see MeSH

featureDescription.name: qualifierName
featureDescription.description: see MeSH

featureDescription.name: descriptorNameMajorTopic
featureDescription.description: see MeSH

featureDescription.name: qualifierNameMajorTopic
featureDescription.description: see MeSH

featureDescription.name: registryNumber
featureDescription.description: A unique 5 to 9 digit number in hyphenated format assigned by the Chemical Abstract Service to specify chemical substances, a zero is a valid number when an actual number cannot be located or is not yet available., C

featureDescription.name: nameOfSubstance
featureDescription.description: The name of the substance that the registry number or the E.C. number identifies, C

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jules.types.DBInfo
typeDescription.description: References to other databases, e.g. SwissProt, INTERPRO e.g.

featureDescription.name: name
featureDescription.description: The name of the DB referred to

featureDescription.name: acList
featureDescription.description: A list of accession numbers for this DB, C

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jules.types.Keyword
typeDescription.description: A term of a controlled keyword list to describe the content of the publication.

featureDescription.name: name
featureDescription.description: The name of the keyword, C

featureDescription.name: source
featureDescription.description: Tthe keyword source (terminology), O

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jules.types.Language
typeDescription.description: The language of the document. Possible values: based on ISO-639-1 language codes; we start with a first selection (which might be extended later).

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jules.types.AuthorInfo
typeDescription.description: AuthorInfo Type annotates the text segments containing the information about an author and his/her affiliation information.

featureDescription.name: foreName
featureDescription.description: An authors forename

featureDescription.name: affiliation
featureDescription.description: Affiliation of the author

featureDescription.name: contact
featureDescription.description: Contact information (emails, phones, etc.), O

featureDescription.name: lastName
featureDescription.description: The last name of the author.

featureDescription.name: initials
featureDescription.description: Initials
